## ProductJsonLdProps.gtin13 property

The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gtin13?: string | string[];
```

## Remarks

This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero. See [GS1 GTIN Summary](http://www.gs1.org/barcodes/technical/idkeys/gtin) for more details.
